contentList.content: Sorted
General
General settings
Enable mod
Toggle the mod on/off without uninstalling it.
Logging/Utilities
Log level
0 = Off, 1 = Error, 2 = Warn, 3 = Info, 4 = Debug, 5 = Trace (Debug and Trace can be extremely performance intensive under certain circumstances - use info unless debugging something)
Record Applicable Entity Properties

Whether to enable Entity Property Recorder, which records the properties that AIM can use in its ItemFilters when items are picked up or characters join the party/are in it on activation/level load. Can be performance intensive when processing a lot of items in a short period of time!
Features
Item Distribution
Respect Container Blacklist during CustomStackUsing calculations

Whether to respect the containerRoots section of the ItemBlackList when processing STACK_AMOUNT filters using calculateStackUsing. You probably want this enabled if you keep your Transmog reference items on you, or some similar context.
Redistribute Consumables On Use During Combat
Whether to allow AIM to re-distribute the party's consumable items when they're used during combat - i.e. drinking a small healing potion will redistribute all small healing potions
Distribute Items If Picked Up During Combat
Whether to allow AIM to process a picked-up item during combat - i.e. if Heat Metal forced you to drop your sword, you would want it to just go to the person who picked it up
Distribute Items On First Load
Whether to allow AIM to process the party's inventory on level load - only matters to existing saves that added AIM mid-way
